- Tuy\u1ec7t t&aacute;c ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng b&ecirc;n v\u1ecbnh thi&ecirc;n \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng<\/p>\r\n\r\n\t<p>APEC Mandala Wyndham M\u0169i N&eacute; - d\u1ef1 &aacute;n condotel ti&ecirc;n phong t&ocirc;n vinh v\u1ebb \u0111\u1eb9p s\u01a1 khai v&agrave; n&acirc;ng t\u1ea7m du l\u1ecbch bi\u1ec3n B&igrave;nh Thu\u1eadn. T\u1ecda l\u1ea1c tr&ecirc;n cung \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng \u0111\u1eb9p nh\u1ea5t B&igrave;nh Thu\u1eadn, s\u1edf h\u1eefu th\u1ebf \u0111\u1ea5t &ldquo;t\u1ecda s\u01a1n h\u01b0\u1edbng th\u1ee7y&rdquo; h&uacute;t t&agrave;i gi\u1eef l\u1ed9c, Apec Mandala Wyndham M\u0169i N&eacute; n\u1ed5i l&ecirc;n nh\u01b0 m\u1ed9t \u1ed1c \u0111\u1ea3o xanh t\u01b0\u01a1i v\u1edbi thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf \u0111\u1ed9c \u0111&aacute;o t\u1eeb c\u1ea3m h\u1ee9ng c\u1ee7a n\u1eafng, gi&oacute; v&agrave; ki\u1ebfn tr&uacute;c Ch\u0103m Pa \u0111\u1ed9c b\u1ea3n.&nbsp; Apec Mandala Wyndham M\u0169i N&eacute; mang \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 nh\u1eefng gi&aacute; tr\u1ecb s\u1ed1ng th\u01b0\u1ee3ng l\u01b0u, h\u1ed9i t\u1ee5 nh\u1eefng d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 gi\u1ea3i tr&iacute; \u0111\u1ec9nh cao v&agrave; v\u1eadn h&agrave;nh b\u1edfi th\u01b0\u01a1ng hi\u1ec7u qu\u1ea3n l&yacute; kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n h&agrave;ng \u0111\u1ea7u th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi.<\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li style=\"box-sizing: border-box; padding: 2px 0px; margin: 0px 20px; list-style: initial;\">\r\n\t<p><span><img alt=\"\" height=\"844\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/3(12).jpg\" width=\"1500\" \/><span title=\"K\u00e9o r\u00ea \u0111\u1ec3 thay \u0111\u1ed5i k\u00edch c\u1ee1\">\u200b<\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n\t<h4>D\u1ecaCH V\u1ee4<\/h4>\r\n\r\n\t<h2>CHU\u1ed6I TI\u1ec6N &Iacute;CH, D\u1ecaCH V\u1ee4 5* CHU\u1ea8N QU\u1ed0C T\u1ebe<\/h2>\r\n\r\n\t<p>Apec Mandala Wyndham M\u0169i N&eacute; s\u1edf h\u1eefu chu\u1ed7i ti\u1ec7n &iacute;ch, d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 5* chu\u1ea9n qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf, mang \u0111\u1ebfn nh\u1eefng tr\u1ea3i nghi\u1ec7m ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng \u0111\u1eb3ng c\u1ea5p d&agrave;nh ri&ecirc;ng cho du kh&aacute;ch. V\u1edbi kh&ocirc;ng gian r\u1ed9ng ngay s&aacute;t bi\u1ec3n, Apec Mandala Wyndham M\u0169i N&eacute; s\u1edf h\u1eefu c&ocirc;ng vi&ecirc;n n\u01b0\u1edbc \u1ea5n t\u01b0\u1ee3ng c&ugrave;ng nhi\u1ec1u tr&ograve; ch\u01a1i h\u1ea5p d\u1eabn mang \u0111\u1ebfn cho du kh&aacute;ch nh\u1eefng gi\u1edd ph&uacute;t s\u1ea3ng kho&aacute;i v&agrave; tho\u1ea3i m&aacute;i nh\u1ea5t.&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n\t<p>H\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng c&aacute;c b\u1ec3 b\u01a1i v&ocirc; c\u1ef1c view bi\u1ec3n cho c\u1ea3m nh\u1eadn ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng kh&aacute;c bi\u1ec7t ngay v\u1ecbnh thi&ecirc;n \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng M\u0169i N&eacute;. C&ugrave;ng v\u1edbi \u0111&oacute; l&agrave; h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng trung t&acirc;m th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i, spa, jjim jil bang, fitness, chu\u1ed7i nh&agrave; h&agrave;ng 5* \u0111\u1eb3ng c\u1ea5p v&agrave; h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng bar, club \u1ea5n t\u01b0\u1ee3ng, h\u1ee9a h\u1eb9n mang \u0111\u1ebfn cho du kh&aacute;ch k&igrave; ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi b&ecirc;n v\u1ecbnh thi&ecirc;n \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng.<\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li style=\"box-sizing: border-box;
